google_reviews.author: Jeremy Glasgow
google_reviews.review: My sister and I have been working to get approved for a townhouse unit under Landmark. We worked with Frank on the application process, and he was great. There were many hoops I had to jump through when he was verifying my rental history due to errors from my prior management companies, and Frank was patient and understanding throughout the whole process. After I got it cleared up he sent us notification that we were approved for the unit as well. He was communicative throughout the whole process, which is something that spoke volumes to me, especially given that my current management company doesnt communicate with their tenants about anything. Overall, I had a great experience with the application process with Landmark!

google_reviews.author: Allison Jones
google_reviews.review: Landmarks team communicates well with tenants, notifying in advance of upcoming maintenance procedures. They provide friendly reminders that encourage tenants to take good care of their rentals and shared spaces outdoors. They are prompt and friendly when responding to messages and questions. I recommend Landmark. They work hard to find the right balance between landlord involvement and tenant autonomy.

google_reviews.author: Patrick Blaine
google_reviews.review: Were just getting started with Landmark but had had a great experience so far. Efficient, informative, good customer service. Highly recommended in a tight market. Ocean, Sade, and Frank have been great to work with.

google_reviews.author: Madi Kaatz
google_reviews.review: Our guide for the showing at 804 Dupont St, I believe his name was Graham, was friendly, kind, professional and did a great job of answering all of my questions to the best of his knowledge. I had a few more questions that were in-depth about the property so I called and was connected with the property managers assistant, Marianna. Peak customer service! Very friendly, professional, answered all my questions and offered her support in the future if anything more came up. This is a really good crew of people working together and it made me want to work with Landmark more in the future!

google_reviews.author: Ryan N
google_reviews.review: I had a excellent experience with landmark.  They made the rental process as smooth as possible.  Also, the communication was prompt and clear which made the renting process with them a stress-free experience. Haelley and Cami was very friendly and accommodating. I appreciate all their help during my lease at Martime heritage apartments!

google_reviews.author: Ashleigh Rainey
google_reviews.review: Other than paying $100 more per month than I should be paying due to the property managers mistake in not disclosing all the information to me I had asked for about a specific unit, (chose specific larger unit due to the info given to me, found out it was false, switched to cheaper unit I would have chosen in the first place had I been given the correct info, but still charged same price as larger one) I do love this apartment complex and think its the best in the area!

google_reviews.author: Jon Liddle
google_reviews.review: Carmela is the absolute greatest! Always a positive attitude, and is willing to help when contractors need to conduct work on LRE property.

google_reviews.author: Madison Asher
google_reviews.review: Since we moved to our new unit in July, Landmark has been quick and helpful in replying and responding to maintenance requests and concerns. Cami is very helpful!

google_reviews.author: Ana Ferreira
google_reviews.review:
I wanted to take a moment to express my heartfelt appreciation for the outstanding management of Cami Winslow.
As a tenant, i have been consistently impressed by her dedication, professionalism and genuine care for this place I call home.
Her promptness in addressing maintenance issues, inquiries, knowing that we can rely on her to swiftly handle any concerns that arise, brings me a sense of security and comfort.
Cami has an approachable nature and warm demeanor. Her willingness to listen to my concerns and address them with empathy and understanding truly sets her apart as an exceptional property manager. We are incredibly grateful to have been here for 3 years and excited to keep calling this place our home.
Thank you Cami! Youre truly the best!

google_reviews.author: Cyrena J
google_reviews.review: Respectful and polite property management group who will try their best to help you out! Ive been living with them for four years now.

google_reviews.author: Brianna Matthews
google_reviews.review: the common room for guest to go into is a great place to hang out and you can even hook up your gaming devices to the tv in there. The roof is a great place to go to have a party or to enjoy the fire pit with friends and lastly the work out room is great and helpful too. I honestly love living here

google_reviews.author: Brandi Bowman
google_reviews.review: Landmark was QUICK to get us an answer on the place we wanted to rent. They were very accommodating even giving recommendations to help us get approved. When we went in person to place a hold on the unit staff was super friendly and personable. We would recommend Landmark to others looking to rent as well!

google_reviews.author: Betsy Hicks-Russ
google_reviews.review: The whole on boarding experience for moving-in was delightful. Chelsea was amazing at taking care of my request extremely efficiently.

google_reviews.author: Aubrey Carhart
google_reviews.review: I cant say enough about Landmark!  This was the first time I have had to rent in over 25 years and Landmark made the process so easy. All fees and payments are clearly explained and are very fair. If there is something going on in my building, Landmark notifies me instantly. Marianna and Kaitlyn are my little renting fairy godmothers!  Mariana is on top of everything and is so gracious to answer any little question I have and she makes me feel a part of the community where I live. She is prompt in returning phone calls and emails and is always there to help troubleshoot anything!!!!  She and Kaitlyn are so professional and Im so grateful for them both!!

google_reviews.author: Alyssa Jackson
google_reviews.review: We had a great experience from start to finish with Landmark. They were gracious and accommodating especially when things didnt go planned. Cami was quick to rely to email and phone calls. She advocated for our requests. We didnt have to wait long for things to get repaired. We are leaving happy!

google_reviews.author: Michael Kelly
google_reviews.review: The unit is well appointed, comfortable and quiet. The grounds are nicely kept. The neighbors are quiet and respectful. This was very nice experience. Landmark Realty is responsive and attentive and takes excellent care of the property. This is a very nice place to rent and convenient to downtown Lynden.

google_reviews.author: Michael Gates
google_reviews.review: Loved living here. Nice apartment and when an issue happened, it was resolved quickly. Haelley the onsite manager is the best manager I've had. She's really good at her job and a good person. Whatever they pay her, it should be a lot more.

google_reviews.author: Olivia Messenger
google_reviews.review: At first, there was a mixup with our holding fee and landmark gave our unit to someone else. At first, we were very bummed but Cami, our property manager, did everything she could do find us another unit that would work for us. She even came and personally toured the new property with us! Very thankful for Cami and we are very excited to move into our apartment in Lynden!!

google_reviews.author: Steve Christofferson
google_reviews.review: Wonderful to work with especially Carmela Cruz who always seems to go above and beyond when I needed something. Communicative, fast, and responsive.

google_reviews.author: Martina Gehringer
google_reviews.review: Hailey, the showing agent, was awesome!! She was punctual and helpful and friendly. Also the front desk agent who took my holding fee was lovely, but I didn't get her name. I'm so excited about my new apartment!

google_reviews.author: Marci Massoni
google_reviews.review: Very detailed application process, but thorough. Help was available at every step. Property manager very helpful.

google_reviews.author: Allison Ormsby
google_reviews.review: Landmark has been incredible to work with! As a person from outside of Bellingham (Seattle) moving to the area, they were incredibly responsive to my questions and request for tours. Haelley at the Maritime Heritage Building offered quick turnaround tour times while I was visiting, and was so accommodating. Cami has been great to work with on preparing the lease and completing necessary paperwork. Overall, it comes through that this team really cares about their (future) tenants. I'm thrilled I get to live in one of their buildings!

google_reviews.author: maria
google_reviews.review: Cami was the sweetest person and was such a huge help while getting our new place! Very friendly and wonderful. Thank you so much!

google_reviews.author: Jeanette Strnard
google_reviews.review:
From the Landmark real estate mngmnt front of to the property's manager everyone has been efficient,  patient & extremely helpful with helping me to secure housing from out of state.
No surprises all $ & expectations have been 100% on point. Absolutely a professional & refreshing experience!

google_reviews.author: Cheyenne Mills
google_reviews.review: Landmark is the best Property Management company to have when renting. They are professional, efficient, and fair. Our family of 6 has had the best experience with them since day one! They moved mountains so we could move in almost 2 weeks early with our 5 day old baby. They have also been fair and effective when dealing with neighborly disputes. Our assigned property manager, Cami Winslow, has been absolutely wonderful and the most understanding. We feel very blessed to have found this place and this great company at such a stressful time in our lives.

google_reviews.author: Kim Wickman
google_reviews.review: Tia was amazing! Her customer service went above and beyond and she was so friendly and helpful with everything every step of the way! I truly appreciated her communication with us during our search for an apartment. We will use landmark again!

google_reviews.author: Tanner Larson
google_reviews.review: We've had two property managers with landmark, both of which have been excellent. More recently, Caitlin has been our contact. Her communication has been great and she has already earned our trust by completing complex projects quickly and under budget. She has also handled sensitive issues with a high level of professionalism which is appreciated. I would recommend this property manager to others.

google_reviews.author: Eileen Harrington
google_reviews.review: Jill was super helpful and made the application procedure easy -- as it is always a lot of paperwork when renting an apartment. Her friendliness and getting on things right away made a big difference. :)

google_reviews.author: Miranda Cox
google_reviews.review: I rented through landmark for 2 years and never had any issues while there. I spoke with Lolly regarding some questions I had about my lease and she was very quick to respond and gave me all of the information I needed. I appreciated her working with me and taking the time to explain all my options.

google_reviews.author: Heidi Jackson
google_reviews.review:
I am not happy at all. First, they pressure you into putting down a non-refundable holding fee. In this economy, the competition for housing is overwhelming so if you find a place that looks good, you have to jump on the application. But now, they say it's not first come first serve unless you pay the nonrefundable holding fee. This is extremely predatory. We were pressured into paying this before we had seen the unit. Then we went to see the unit only to discover that it was completely misrepresented as a 2 bedroom. It is not a legal 2 bedroom. It is a 1 bedroom with a windowless office. This seems criminal. Now we are locked into an apartment that is going to be uninhabitable for our family. Now we have 48 hours to sign a lease or what? You get to keep the nearly $500 I gave you? It's really greedy of you. I'm going into this lease very unhappy and looking immediately for somewhere else to rent.

On top of all of that, I asked to be shown an empty unit and the person at the front desk did not relay that to the person showing me the apartment so I was unable to take measurements like I needed to. So now I have to go into the moving process not knowing what furniture I need to keep or get rid which is very inconvenient. And of course you don't just have the dimensions or a floorplan because you don't think of your renters as humans who might need to know that stuff. We're just cattle you cram into these unconscionably small boxes that you massively overprice. Bellingham City Council needs to do something about this. I'm writing a letter to the mayor to encourage her to actually do something about the greedy,  predatory, and criminal rental companies in this town. I thought Landmark was one of the decent companies because I rented with them before and it was fine but it seems they have lost their minds. Greed ultimately corrupts. It's just maddening that this is what we have to live with.

google_reviews.author: Deb Shawver
google_reviews.review: I helped my get my daughter into an apartment and the staff were super responsive and very fast at processing and approving our application! thank you!

google_reviews.author: Mark DeClue
google_reviews.review: I appreciate the wonderful customer service provided by everyone I interacted with at Landmark. The knowledge, care, and patience was fantastic. I really appreciate how much the team at Landmark work together to provided excellent customer service. Thank you for taking care of us.

google_reviews.author: constance snowden
google_reviews.review: Cami and Jill worked very hard to put together my rental application for a quick move up to Bellingham for work. I am so thankful for all their help and assistance along the way! Thank you cant wait!

google_reviews.author: Julianna Leininger
google_reviews.review: I have had a great experience working with landmark. Cami and Yanna have been such wonderful people answering any questions I have had and being on top of responding back fast and efficiently each time. Very respectful people to work with!

google_reviews.author: Enrique Romero Jr.
google_reviews.review: After being displaced from our home because of burst sprinkler, Landmark has been communicative and working really hard to get us into a new place. Overall, the management is great on a daily basis, whether it's issues with parking or with maintenance. Katherine, Wanda, Sue, and all the workers through the 8 or so years I have lived at their complex have been nice and treated me fairly. They are professional, courteous, and work hard. Twin Pines Apartments are run well and recommended for anyone looking for a nice, comfortable apartment to call home.

google_reviews.author: Ariana Schindler
google_reviews.review: My family moved in from out of state and Landmark has made our big transition super easy! They are so quick to respond to questions and everyone Ive worked with has been so kind and helpful. If youre moving to the area, I highly recommend checking out Landmark properties!

google_reviews.author: Zoya Maliha Sultana
google_reviews.review: Very efficient and smooth communication, fast application reviews. Everything is possible remotely and online, and made my move smooth as I am moving from another city.

google_reviews.author: Wesley Cox
google_reviews.review:
Originally moved from out of state and the staff were amazing at helping me find a place and get all the correct paperwork done! I typically would talk to Ocean at the front desk who was always helpful but I was never turned away by any other front office staff.

Recently a pipe had burst in our current unit and our property manager was extremely helpful throughout the entire process. She helped us pick out alternative units and worked really hard to get our application the attention it needed!

Overall Im very pleased, Ive never had them ignore a maintenance request and they have always been very attentive and caring in times of need!

google_reviews.author: Ben Robinett
google_reviews.review: Absolutely stellar experience with Landmark Real Estate Management! From day one, their professionalism and dedication shone through. Their seamless handling of every aspect of property management, from tenant screenings to maintenance requests, exceeded my expectations. Communication was prompt and transparent, ensuring peace of mind throughout. Their proactive approach and attention to detail truly set them apart. Trustworthy, reliable, and efficient  Landmark Real Estate Management is the epitome of excellence in property management. I wholeheartedly recommend their services to anyone seeking top-tier management for their properties. Five stars without hesitation!

google_reviews.author: Chester Pownall
google_reviews.review: Just renewed my lease with Landmark Real Estate Management for the 3rd year in a row.  Ive felt like every concern Ive had over the 3 years Ive been a tenant has been answered in a prop and timely manner.  Most renters have encountered challenges with their rental. A appliance goes out, issues with a fuse box etc which is of course to be expected. Any homeowner can tell you the challenges one can face within the home and what it takes to fix it.  As a renter, its so important to have a landlord or management company that takes these issues seriously and fixes them promptly.  Fortunately with our Manager Cami Winslow, every concern or issue has been resolved quickly and fixed correctly.  Knowing that these things will be fixed when needed is invaluable and the biggest reason we are staying with Landmark and at our current residence.

google_reviews.author: Rochelle Macagba
google_reviews.review: When we moved in, our light bulbs were put in incorrectly and Cami was extremely responsive and able to help us quickly. We are now ending our 1.5yr lease and between Cami and Yanna, we were so well taken care of. The immediate responses, attention to detail and patience they had with us through difficult times are what made us rate them 5 stars. This is our second place and second lease ending with Landmark. I will be applying with them again

google_reviews.author: Joshua Hauserman
google_reviews.review:
My experience with the apartment staff during the application process was nothing short of exceptional. From the very beginning, they displayed an impressive level of receptiveness and willingness to address all my questions and concerns.

One standout quality was their ability to collaborate. They not only listened attentively but also responded promptly and effectively, making the entire process notably smoother. Their ability to accommodate and address any challenges I encountered during the move-in phase was particularly commendable. I felt genuinely supported and understood, which made a significant difference in my overall experience.

Their proactive and professional approach stood out, as they worked diligently to ensure that any hurdles or difficulties I faced were promptly resolved. Their willingness to go above and beyond to ensure a seamless transition into the apartment was truly appreciated.

The staff's commitment to excellence and their dedication to ensuring a positive experience for tenants, especially during the critical phase of moving in, was highly impressive. I am grateful for their support and understanding, which significantly contributed to making my transition into the new apartment a much smoother process.

I wholeheartedly recommend this apartment complex, not only for its facilities but also for its exceptional staff who truly understand the importance of customer service and satisfaction.

Thank you to the entire team for their outstanding support and accommodation throughout the application and move-in process.

google_reviews.author: August McMahon
google_reviews.review: I've lived with them for two years now. The first year they did not inform me one of my roommates was a  registered sex offender (egregiously so). They're highly likely to keep your deposit no matter what, potentially charge you beyond your thousand dollar deposit, and never respond to maintenance calls. The second year the bathtub was clogged from move in time, the walls have unpainted putty all over them, trim around the edges rotting out, no weather trimming on front door, dishwasher filled with black mold. The agent I had showing the property was an hour and a half late, didn't know which key was for the buildings front door, or how to access the laundry room. If you're new to town, DON'T rent through them if you can help it. They mostly own property around the university to take advantage of students who've never rented before and don't know better.

google_reviews.author: Bonnie Wheeler
google_reviews.review: They are a big fat scam that takes your money and won't give it back when the say over and over again it's refundable but you have to send more to get it back. scam

owner_response.text: Thank you, Bonnie, for bringing this to our attention. We are very concerned to hear about your experience, as we have no record of your account with us and are committed to upholding transparent, fair practices. We encourage you to reach out to us directly at info@visitlandmark.com so we can discuss this matter further and explore how we might be able to assist. We look forward to hearing from you and understanding your experience better.

google_reviews.author: Madeline Shaw
google_reviews.review: Landmark is great to work with! Frank Youngblood and his team were very helpful and made the lease process very straightforward. Thanks!

google_reviews.author: Ahsha Poplack
google_reviews.review: Such an amazing apartment. The neighborhood is great for walks and its very close to anything youd need. Very safe and secure as well

google_reviews.author: Ellen Wojtanek
google_reviews.review: I have lived in a lovely residence, managed by Landmark, for a couple of years now. Its so nice to have a rental company that is easy to work with, responds quickly, and always follows through. Shoutout to my property manager, Cami Winslow, and her team for the consistent care and attention to detail and always making sure things run smooth!

google_reviews.author: Lesly Mendoza
google_reviews.review: During my rental experience, it was very amicable to work with Marianna Masullo, she insured that I had a place to stay with a smooth transition when changing units. She would go above and beyond to ensure her tenants are happy and properly informed. I will definitely lease back again with Landmark. The entire staff is very friendly, and they take the time to listen and ensure every need is taking care off. Thank you Landmark.

google_reviews.author: Calie Bouma
google_reviews.review:
Absolutely awful company. Rented there for a year. Right from the start the house had so many repairs needed even though they had a solid month in between renters they could have fixed everything. House had rats and company did nothing about aside from set two (2) traps in the basement.
Maintenance took weeks to come through to fix our toilet and sink that were leaking and drove our water bill way up.
Oven and dryer did not work until weeks into move in.
Landmark is a greedy, sleezy, slumlord company. Do not give them your money.

Attached is photo of mummified rat that was in our basement since before we moved in.

owner_response.text:
Thank you for sharing your feedback. We sincerely apologize for the issues you encountered during your stay. It is our priority to ensure our properties are well-maintained and that our tenants have a comfortable living experience.

We're sorry to hear about the repairs and pest issues you mentioned. This is certainly not the standard we aim for. We typically conduct thorough inspections and repairs between tenants, and it's clear we fell short in your case. Regarding the pest problem, our usual procedure is to address such issues promptly and effectively, and we regret that our efforts were insufficient in your situation.

We also apologize for the delayed maintenance services. We understand how frustrating this can be, especially when it affects your utilities and daily living. We are currently reviewing our processes to ensure that maintenance requests are handled more efficiently in the future.

If you have any further concerns or would like to discuss this matter in more detail, please do not hesitate to contact us directly. Your feedback is valuable in helping us improve our services.

google_reviews.author: Kala Bay
google_reviews.review: I am tenant and I had a flood happen in my apartment recently. There was a gap in communication with my property manager, but when I tried to follow up, I reached the front desk. Ocean, the first lady I spoke with, was rude and short with me. She doesn't tell you what she is going to do she just sends you off to someone. I asked her not to just send me off to a voicemail, because this was a time sensitive matter and instead of talking with me to solve this issue, she transferred me anyway. When I called back in, I got someone else (I can't remember her name, unfortunately) and she was extremely disrespectful. I don't know what happened in the two minutes it took me to call back, but as soon as I introduced myself, she had a terrible attitude. Immediately was talking over me, cutting me off when I tried to explain the situation, raised her voice at me, and accused me of yelling at her. It was the WORST customer service interaction I've ever had. She was extremely rude, disrespectful, unkind, unwilling to help resolve the issue at hand, as is her job. She is obviously incapable of handling that position, if that is how she treats the tenants calling in for assistance. I asked to be transferred to her supervisor, and she was snarky about it, but luckily transferred me right away. I spoke with Wendy. Wendy was amazing. Clearly, knew how to do her job, and what customer service meant. Literally, all I wanted was an escalation so that my property manager knew that I was trying to reach her about a time sensitive issue. That's it. That's a completely reasonable request, and Wendy was able to  help me with that in 5 minutes. So, in my experience, don't go into that office, expecting to be treated with dignity. At least not by those two workers. They showed very clearly that they have no desire to be respectful or uphold any standard to customer service.

google_reviews.author: Cynthia Williams
google_reviews.review: I have always had prompt polite and professional communication and service with Landmark Real Estate Management. Cami Lawrence the property manager is not only professional and reliable she is also very compassionate and understanding. So thankful to have them as our property management company.

google_reviews.author: D L
google_reviews.review:
Professional and responsive property management team of Leslie and Katharine for the majority of our lease with Landmark. Some hiccups upon move in (office staff miscommunication), and issues with aggressive neighbors, however Katharine and Leslie were usually quick and reasonable to have things settled. The property itself was well maintained, they were also responsive to upgrading security and cleaning up the lobby after issues there.

4.5/5 would rent from again

google_reviews.author: Yvonne
google_reviews.review: Ive been working with Cami Winslow to get into a new place and she was super helpful and quick to respond. Jill in applications was also amazing in helping me and setting my mind at ease when I ran into a personal issue. Im very grateful for the team at Landmark and all the help I received.

google_reviews.author: Star Randmel
google_reviews.review: Lolly is so sweet and checks in with me it feels like were friends! Definitely recommend  very loving environment, attentive and helpful

google_reviews.author: Kara McGinn
google_reviews.review: The Landmark team were responsive and helpful as we navigated housing in Bellingham. I am a parent of a WWU student and glad that this housing management company was willing to work with each of the student's families whose sons lived together during college on the lease agreement. Thank you!

google_reviews.author: Elisheva Mechir
google_reviews.review: Both my roommate Cynthia and I have nothing but praise for Landmark Real Estate Management. And our experience working with our property manager Cami Winslow, has been has been an absolute pleasure! We both agree that choosing Landmark Reality Management was the best decision we could have ever made. Keep up the great work. Both my roommate and I appreciate all that you do!!  Sincerely, Elisheva Mechir & Cynthia Williams.

google_reviews.author: Laney bell
google_reviews.review: Just viewed my first apartment. Tia Herring was the lovely lady that showed me around and she was awesome!  Look forward to working with this property  management!  Thanks!

google_reviews.author: Rich Morgan
google_reviews.review: Excellent property managers, particularily Lolly and Brittany who managed our building at Francis Park, they were fantastic.

google_reviews.author: Jack
google_reviews.review: My friend and I had a fantastic experience renting from landmark. Our property manager Marianna was always on top of everything, whether it was maintenance requests, lease stuff, or moving out it was always a stress free and easy process. Would definitely recommend renting from them

google_reviews.author: Retrosp3cte YT
google_reviews.review: Had a great experience with Wanda, SSC was mistaken in if the property was landmarks property and started getting aggressive on the phone so we took it in to get assistance with clearing the confusion and Wanda was a champion on the phone and helped get everything squared away

google_reviews.author: Staci Shrum
google_reviews.review:
Thank you so much to Caitlin McAdams. She is the property manager where my parents live.
The building suffered a burst sprinkler main during the cold streak in January. Several units were impacted, including my parents apartment. My parents needed to vacate their damaged and flooded home. Caitlin helped all of us navigate the next steps. She kept us in the loop by communicating the next steps. She was responsive when we had questions/concerns. She advocated for my parents. Thank you, Caitlin!
And thank you to Marianna Massullo for your continued support. Marianna worked closely with my parents when they first moved in. Again, she was so responsive and helpful.
I appreciate the respectful communication and kindness shown.

google_reviews.author: Bianca Zhupa
google_reviews.review:
I am very satisfied with the smooth application process, completed in a timely manner. The Application Manager, Mr Frank Youngblood, as well as  the Landmark Real Estate Management Front Office have been courteous and helpful during the application process that was completed in just a few days. All stars deserved!

A happy prospect renter,
Bianca Zhupa

google_reviews.author: Ben Green
google_reviews.review: We had a slightly stressful experience getting approved for the apartment but otherwise everything went well.

google_reviews.author: Gail Stringer
google_reviews.review: Kathryn (sp?) and Frank were great to work with. As a mom of a college student calling from far away I was rather clueless about the whole process and Kathryn was so helpful! She made your company feel like they actually care about the tenants (students) with whom they interact all year long. She graciously talked me through a lot of the co-signing and rental process. Thank you!!  Gail

google_reviews.author: Barbara Yarar
google_reviews.review: I had a very good experience viewing two of landmarks properties with the hopes to move in to one with a water view. Tia was quite welcoming as soon as I arrived, had info about the properties , 3 total, and accommodated seeing them back to back to save time. She showed me every room and was very friendly, I shared my circumstances and my wish list and she was able to show me exactly what I was looking for. I appreciated the time she took, I immediately proc ended to put down the hold fee and am hopeful I will be in this new unit within the month.

google_reviews.author: Jim Warford
google_reviews.review: Angie, the Showing Agent, was wonderful. Knowledgeable, friendly and easy to talk to. Both properties are possibilities for us and still on our list.

google_reviews.author: Lynda Lehrke
google_reviews.review: I want to give a shout out to our Manager Haelley at Maritime Heritage! She is very personable, friendly, and eager to help. Whenever I ask for assistance to address an issue, she responds immediately and effectively. We are very fortunate to have such a hands on person to troubleshoot for us. She is a keeper for sure!

google_reviews.author: Deborah Wagner
google_reviews.review: I have bedbugs  my knob to my bath is not there and my deck blinds don't open all the way. 9336 Bales Ave Apt C

owner_response.text: Hi Deborah this is Wanda at Landmark in Bellingham Washington I'm sorry, but your property is not one that we manage since you are in Missouri.

google_reviews.author: Benjamin Lowe
google_reviews.review: Cami has been wonderful to work with. My family greatly appreciates her.

google_reviews.author: Melia Webb
google_reviews.review: It was an absolute pleasure working with Cami, Wanda, and Haelley throughout my stay at Maritime Heritage Apartments. So thankful for my time spent here

google_reviews.author: Kylaijah Mathis
google_reviews.review: Tia Herring Help us so much on finding our first appartment. She has great input. Just make sure you come in perpared and she is a wonderful help. Also We did go ask for help in person with printed out forms (places/, travel time, Questions, price preferseces, etc.)

google_reviews.author: Charles Devereux
google_reviews.review: Just getting started as a co-signer. The non-refundable application fee for all applicants and their co-signers seems excessive, but other than that they seem to be a decent operation. The background checks are a pain but also are appreciated, as parents of a student renter.

google_reviews.author: Astro Spider
google_reviews.review: Very friendly and intelligent representative. All of my concerns were quickly addressed and I appreciate the quick response.

google_reviews.author: Sophia Rose
google_reviews.review: The Landmark team was incredibly helpful and communicative with us during our renting process! They answered all of our questions promptly and made sure we had everything we needed to move forward.

google_reviews.author: Douglas Hamilton
google_reviews.review: Quick to respond and addressed my concerns and queries.  Kristina was extremely prompt and precise.

google_reviews.author: Domenica Dee
google_reviews.review: absolutely love this community The atmosphere is welcoming, the amenities are great, and the staffespecially Caitlin is incredibly professional and attentive. Highly recommend this business to anyone looking for comfortable and well-managed living!

google_reviews.author: Scott McIntosh
google_reviews.review: My rent is VERY high and for what I pay I would expect better appliances. They have been responsive to the two maintenance requests I have submitted in the almost two (2) years I have lived here. Updated 4/3/2024 - I informed Landmark that I wanted to downsize over 2 months ago and no-one ever called me. I ended up switching to another property management company (ACP). Even now Landmark is not answering their phones. Although I loved the house, it was just too much house for me alone and I am happy that ACP assisted me with downsizing. Honestly, stay away from Landmark.

google_reviews.author: Thomas Kolba (Tom)
google_reviews.review: I give Sophia Place apartments property, Landmark Real Estate in Bellingham five stars.  The building is well kept, and Sophia manager, Lolly, is very communicative.  This, to me, is key to a successful renter/landlord relationship.  I appreciate the service at Sophia and am delighted to be a resident here.

google_reviews.author: Tyler Browne
google_reviews.review: I know someone who rents a place that has recently been taken over by Amanda at landmark. This person is being stalked and harassed by their neighbor daily, and when Amanda was told of the situation , she didn't care. She is always rude with this person who has rented there nearly a decade. It's a nightmare! Don't try to seek help , it's a waist of time.

owner_response.text: Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We're sorry to hear about your friend's experience. At Landmark, we take tenant concerns very seriously and aim to resolve issues promptly. Please have your friend contact our office directly by calling or emailing info@visitlandmark.com, referencing this review. This will ensure they are connected with someone who can assist in addressing their situation and ensuring a safe and respectful living environment.

google_reviews.author: Kristyn Murphy
google_reviews.review: The application process was made very quick and easy with the help of Ocean! thanks :)

google_reviews.author: Sabrina Szabo
google_reviews.review: The customer service is fantastic. Im sure they get the same questions every day but they never make you feel like it. My property manager Haeley is very nice and quick to respond to any inquiries.

google_reviews.author: Serafima Zavorotny
google_reviews.review:
What can you expect from a rental company? They were pretty bad, but mostly for the lack of effort and communication they put in. Its nice to be left alone as a tenant, we never had the quarterly inspections or really anyone give us a hard time (except once when they told us we had to mow our lawn, it definitely looked better long but I understand).
However, this lack of communication is why we really didn't enjoy their management. We never (not once!) got emails back when we had questions, if things broke (and things were broken most of the time) it took hours and many, many phone calls to get a hold of anyone. I missed multiple days of classes trying to get in touch with someone about our heating being out during the coldest month of February (it got below 15 degrees and we had no heat in our house).
On that note, there were so many issues with our house which were genuine safety concerns - windows being painted shut, our single toilet consistently breaking (like at least twice a month) and then randomly starting again -- we once called the emergency line because it was a weekend and their response was that we needed to wait until Monday... there were 5 of us and ONE TOILET. Their solution to the no heat problem was to send over 6 space heaters, which immediately flipped the circuits and forced our fridge and freezer to shut off. Our stove top looked like someone had shot at it (literally bullet hole looking things) and the "5th" bedroom they advertised was the size of a walk in closet and I as a 5'2 person could stand straight up only right inside the door. There was no windows in that room and it got above 110 degrees on sunny summer days. I lived in the basement because the fifth bedroom was not a room, the dryer very near to when we moved in got a disconnected aluminum tube that was supposed to send hot wet air outside. Well, it instead filled my room with all of that wet hot air anytime any one used it. We asked them to fix it, got asked to be sent photos, and after we did, no one ever followed up or came to look at it. I tried taping it myself but the moisture was to intense for the tape to stick. My entire room and most of my stuff was often damp for a full year.
I was often genuinely concerned for my well being and the well being of my roommates and I am so glad we decided to move.

google_reviews.author: Ellie White
google_reviews.review: Im in the beginning process of renting a unit from Landmark so I cant attest to how the company is for existing tenants, but I can say that Ive had a positive experience touring the unit with Victoria and going through the application process with Ocean. Both ladies were knowledgeable and friendly and made an otherwise stressful experience painless.

google_reviews.author: Andrea Mendoza
google_reviews.review: Cami Winslow has been so helpful during our business with Landmark. She has worked with me to ensure that things were always running smoothly. Communication with her has always been great. Thanks again !

google_reviews.author: Carrie Dieterich
google_reviews.review: Erika was great in answering my many questions about a change of tenancy.

google_reviews.author: BlackBerry & friends
google_reviews.review:
My family and I were approved for a unit and when it was available for them to
go in after the last tenant, they didn't want to fix anything That needed to be fixed to get us into the unit. Be careful if you're living in a unit on Alabama because some of the stuff has not been fixed or serviced since 2020 and wires are exposed. In the unit as well as mold and a bunch of other stuff that they refused to fix even though they had my holding deposit for over a month and a 1/2 and held me up looking for another place and refused to do any kind of work on the townhouse. Says that they will have their financial department. Reach? Out to you when your holding fee is ready but it will take more than two weeks to get back and they hold you up more! I'm glad I won't be renting from them and that housing saved me for a headache!!

google_reviews.author: Amber
google_reviews.review: I would like to recognize Cami and Yanna at Landmark for being such a diligent, and caring team! Maintenance issues are quickly addressed, the property is regularly visited and maintained, and communication has always been professional and fast.

google_reviews.author: Shaun Pattenden
google_reviews.review: Yesterday, I was in Bellingham to look for an apartment. With Ocean's cheerful and capable assistance, I was able to view several Landmark apartments.  It was my first time in Bellingham and the whole thing went quite well. Thank you, Ocean!

google_reviews.author: Emma S
google_reviews.review: Ocean and Graham went above and beyond! After a key mishap they ensured my day off and 1.5hr drive wasnt useless! Thank you for taking the time to show me another similar unit and answer all of my questions. Super helpful and generous with their time and knowledge.

google_reviews.author: Christopher De Rosa
google_reviews.review: Landmark has been so accommodating with my move in dates and getting me approved. Their communication has been on point and timely.

google_reviews.author: Enedina Espinoza
google_reviews.review: I have rented from land mark for the last 2 years and have had nothing but a great experience especially when working with Carmela and Leslie they are efficient and reliable people when working with landmark! Any and all issues were handled correctly and efficiently thank you ladys for your help!

google_reviews.author: Logan Dwyer
google_reviews.review: Wanda is very kind and gets right on the work you need done! Awesome customer service, Awesome lady!

google_reviews.author: Kathleen Beaty
google_reviews.review:
"Working with property management companies, this one stands out as exceptionally organized. I want to express my gratitude for Kristina Pollard (and her teams) exceptional level of communication, responsiveness, and professionalism. It's truly refreshing to deal with a team that is so well-coordinated and efficient.
Thank you for making the process smooth and hassle-free!"

google_reviews.author: Michael Zhekov
google_reviews.review: This was probably the best tour guide we have ever had. She was kind friendly and honest every single time we has a tour with her. If I were to move out and get a new apartment for next year I would hope she would be there to help me find a new one. She is defiently deserving of a promotion or pay raise and I hope you guys can get thay for her.

google_reviews.author: kahleb richwine
google_reviews.review: Only after applying to three different units and paying 3 different application fees w/ Landmark was I made aware that you have to submit a holding fee to even be considered. Then, they stacked several additional administrative fees that added up to about $600 after first months rent & security deposit. And after moving into the unit, we discovered bed bugs & ticks that same day. Cannot recommend avoiding Landmark enough.

google_reviews.author: Scott McGee
google_reviews.review: Ongoing lack of cleaning of hallways. The piles of hair have been present for 30 days, the items left in the area under the stairs 90 days or more...

owner_response.text: Thank you for your review. We're sorry to hear that your experience was not what you hoped, and we would like to learn more. Please contact us at info@visitlandmark.com so we can address your concerns and improve our services.

google_reviews.author: Olivia CHARBONNEAU
google_reviews.review: Cary is wonderful! My apartment recently flooded and she was with me every step of the way. It was such a stressful time and I can honestly say she made it so much easier on me and my cat. She went above and beyond any other property manager Ive ever had. Thank you!

google_reviews.author: Sergey Nazarov
google_reviews.review: She is so nice and kind and very enthusiastic its always pleasure to work with her

google_reviews.author: Sam Magno
google_reviews.review: I had the pleasure of working with Cami at Landmark and I couldn't be happier with her service. Her team has been incredibly helpful and responsive to any needs or concerns. Even through the change on tenant steps she made the process easy and stress-free.

google_reviews.author: Marisela Hernandez
google_reviews.review: The tour was great. Haelley was very informative and answered all of our questions. The building is beautiful and she made sure to show us all of the amenities.

google_reviews.author: Hope Beck
google_reviews.review:
I signed a lease for my apartment and am scheduled to move out on July 15th. I didn't necessarily have the best experience because for the last month, I was supposed to be charged a prorated amount and I was charged for a full month. After receiving the receipt, I called and spoke to the property manager assistant, who was very not helpful, blamed me for what happened, and told me that I would be refunded (in an unknown amount of time). HOWEVER, I called the office and spoke to Ashley, who was so understanding and incredible. I had called my bank and I was pretty sure that the charge wouldn't go through at all, but I won't know until after my rent payment is technically late. She not only assured me that it obviously was not my fault that the charge was incorrect, but she helped me fix the whole mess that I am in and made sure that I would not be charged any late fees for when it is fixed. Other than that, I haven't had any other issues with Landmark. She did say that this happened to a few people though, so I would check in with them to make sure that your online account is set up right before the last few months of your lease. They really need to change their system.
Their customer service regarding the main office has always been great for me though. Before I spoke to Ashley, I called and spoke to another receptionist who was also so kind and understanding and helpful. That's always been their saving grace in my opinion.

owner_response.text: Hi Hope, Thank you for the 4 star review and the kind words about Ashley and our other front desk associates! They are amazing and do so much on a daily all year round! Don't hesitate to reach back out if your tenant ledger doesn't get updated so we can fix it!

google_reviews.author: Isabelle Garten
google_reviews.review: I have never rented from another company but that is because Landmark has been amazing for the last 2 years. Prompt maintenance, responce to emails, and clear communication (I am also the person to read every word in a contract, which helps avoid surprises because I know what I am getting into. Definitely reccomend for some of these 1 star people). They do have a weird thing with lease takeovers where the security deposit continues through the years, but if you trust your takeover people then we simply figured it out like adults and the people moving in paid the people moving out. It is a weird law but not the end if the world. I also appreciate that we can pay a securing deposit for an apartment we like before viewing or before our applications are processed. Sure, it is a gamble as to whether we get our money back, but it is a well informed one that we take advantage of in the competitive apartment world of bellingham. Overall, I love Landmark and look forward to renting from them another year! Leslie is my current go to person and she is wonderful ^.^

owner_response.text: Hi Isabelle, we really appreciate the 5 stars and your amazing feedback about the team here at Landmark, especially about one of our property managers, Leslie!!! We are happy your overall experience has been 5 stars!

google_reviews.author: Taylor Clements
google_reviews.review: Thank you Cami! We are excited to move into our new home. You made this experience smooth. Great communication!

google_reviews.author: Adam Gray
google_reviews.review: Get experience and so happy to rent through landmark they are so amazing and friendly and just have an amazing community

google_reviews.author: Jennifer Immel
google_reviews.review: Everyone I worked with were friendly and helpful.  When I had some problems with the online lease, I called to make sure all went through and Cami was again very helpful making sure I had completed everything.

google_reviews.author: H La
google_reviews.review:
Terrible customer service, Becca Carr and her whole team. My family is currently renting 2 units with Landmark and we had no problems at all with the previous team. Recently, they changed the new team and it's horrible. I filed for work order on April 27th because the freezer stopped making ice. She followed up with me with a message and I answered her message that the freezer just suddenly stopped working. Then, she just forgot about this email. Now, without a question, if it's suddenly stopped making ice, a normal person would assume something went wrong with the freezer and cooler. However, this lady adressed that I didn't mention anything about the cooler not working. First, who would jump to conclusion immediately without analyzing for information. Second, she didn't want to admit it's her fault for not responding to my email and insisted that we have been communicating via emails, in fact, that didn't happen. Third, she gave me that BS of new construction so it's under warranty and they can't send their men into the unit. Moreover, I called today and brought up this again. The agent answered very unprofessional. "We need name and address, that's more important" with a terrible attitude and tone. Where's "We are sorry that happened to you, can we please get a name and address?" Even McDonald employees are more friendly than Landmark customer service associates. I don't know if we should stay with Landmark for future. This is just very bad experience and unprofessional working ethics from the employees. We are currently paying 3,800-4,000$+ a month for Landmark and for this price, the sastisfaction we received is low to terrible.
It's been 9 days of room temperature food. If anything happens, expect a lawsuit. We have plenty of time and resources to make sure that this is heard !

owner_response.text:
Mr Hung La,
We are so sorry for the delay in repairing your refrigerator! We have confirmed that an appliance repair person will be out today to make repairs. We will also follow up with the team handling your request to ensure that future work orders are not delayed and handled professionally. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to regaining your trust.

google_reviews.author: Sara Halfmann
google_reviews.review: We have had a great experience overall with Landmark. Theyve been very quick to respond to our emails and voicemails, often responding within the business day if they can. Vanessa showed us a beautiful apartment and was so incredibly sweet. She answered all of our questions and helped us out as much as possible. She is not only kind but also very professional. Thank you very much for your thoughtfulness and effort!

owner_response.text: Hi Sara, thank you for the 5 stars and the really kind words about our team member Vanessa!

google_reviews.author: Brent
google_reviews.review: Tia was right on time, very nice and efficient. I liked that she had all needed paperwork ready to go prior to my arrival! Great company representative. The main office was also a great experience!

owner_response.text:
Thank you so much. Was great meeting you.
Tia

google_reviews.author: Leigha Staffenhagen
google_reviews.review: While I can't speak to how others have been treated, I have had nothing but a positive experience with Landmark so far. Our maintenance requests were filled promptly, paying rent is super easy, and the property manager we work with is awesome. She emails back quickly, and always answers my questions and gets back to me.

owner_response.text: Thank you so much for this, Leigha! Renting a home in Bellingham should be a pleasant experience; we're glad to know you are happy. Your kind words will be shared with your Landmark representative so she know's she's doing a great job!

google_reviews.author: Nathan
google_reviews.review: Had a great day being shown apartments by Tia! She was very knowledgeable but never overbearing, giving us plenty of time and space to check things out and ask questions at our own pace. Thank you, Tia!

google_reviews.author: Taylor manoske
google_reviews.review: So far so good, changing units so we will see how much of our deposit we get back. The apartments are cheap and feel safe! I'll update my review if they make this difficult, so hopefully it goes smoothly. Amy the property manager is pretty helpful! And quick to get stuff fixed.

owner_response.text: Hi Taylor, Have no fear! All tenants, including those switching units are entitled to a full refund less carpet cleaning, as long as the unit is left clean and there is no damage beyond normal wear and tear. Hope this helps ease some of your concerns. Thank you for the kind review, we really appreciate it!

google_reviews.author: Paige Vinton
google_reviews.review: I have never actually rented from Landmark, but was interested in one of their properties. It has been a long time since I have rented, so I had a lot of questions. While I was navigating through the process, I had to constantly follow-up on my questions. I was told I would be sent information and it never happened. If it was this challenging just to get information and answers, I can't imagine what it would be like renting through their company.

owner_response.text: Hi Paige, thank you for the feedback on your experience. We will be following up with your showing agent and reviewing your request for additional information to find out how we can improve, and what caused the breakdown in our follow through with communication. We are very sorry that we let you down and hope we have the opportunity to regain your trust!

google_reviews.author: Bellingham Bar
google_reviews.review: Haelley is fantastic to work with. She helped me get situated and worked with me on a shorter term lease. Shes efficient, kind and knowledgeable.

google_reviews.author: Camren Cambra
google_reviews.review:
Updating my review of Landmark due to a change in situation. Long story short, they are as unprofessional and crooked as the rest of the reviews say, even if they manage to put on a good face for a while.

After signing a mutual lease termination in October, they allowed my ex-roommate to stay on the premises for an additional 45 days, during which time he didn't pay rent, utilities, or keep the place clean. At the time they told me not to worry about it, the lease termination meant I wasn't responsible for anything he did after.
After they served him a pay or vacate notice he left, but the apartment was trashed. I offered to clean it up before they did the final move out, as I felt bad he'd been so irresponsible and appreciated what I thought was their help. They told me I wasn't allowed to go back and clean or repair anything because I terminated my lease months ago.

Then, in March, about a week after I move out of the Tullwood apartments and am no longer a Landmark customer, they send me a $1500 bill that includes not only the rent and utilities my former roommate owed, but also all the damages and cleaning fees. That's $1500 AFTER my deposit, which I did not get back when the lease was terminated in October.

Thinking it was a misunderstanding, I called the office several times over the course of the week, and the property managers refused to take or return my calls. It was finally the accountant Rich who said that even with the lease termination I was still responsible for the charges, and to pay up or go to collections.

What a nightmare.

owner_response.text: Carmen, thank you so very much for this kind review. It means a lot to our staff -- Kim, Kimberly and Amy -- who we know work very hard to accomodate the needs of rental home clients.  We're glad you're now tucked safety in Tullwood.

google_reviews.author: Carmie H
google_reviews.review: To all the people rating them 4-5 stars and only having gone through the application move in process youre in for a rude awakening. Landmark made my living experience hell. My property manager Grace in particular was rude, condescending and unprofessional. They waited until two days past rent was due to apply our last months rent and my roommates money got automatically taken from her account. When I called to ask if we could have the money back Grace just kept threatening that if the house wasnt clean we wouldnt get the money back. Not only did they have no right to keep that money but it would be completely illegal to do that. They just want to take advantage of college students who are first time renters.

owner_response.text: Hi Carmie, we appreciate your feedback and we can only address some of your concerns and we know that the system sometimes does have a glitch where it doesn't prorate the rent for the last month and if you have an autopay set up on your portal it will charge that form of payment on the date it was set up to charge because you would need to go in your portal and manually stop the autopay. We do appreciate your review and this feedback helps us improve ourselves as a company, thank you.

google_reviews.author: Josephine Garcia Mata
google_reviews.review: The application and approval process with Landmark has been enjoyable. All of my questions and concerns have been addressed in a professional and fairly prompt manner. Im especially appreciative of my interactions with Delaney whom I was texting back and forth with. She was constantly available to help in a courteous and friendly manner. She even went out of her way a time or two which Im truly grateful for. So far so good!

owner_response.text: Hi Josephine, thank you so much for the kind words and the 5 stars!!

google_reviews.author: Stephanie Delgado
google_reviews.review: Landmark has been amazing. I have had the same rental for almost 9 years. Katherine my leasing specialist has extended so much help and kindness and patience.

google_reviews.author: Dylan Zumwalt
google_reviews.review: At first I thought the terrible customer service was due to the office employees incompetence/laziness, but at this point I can only conclude that they willfully ignore their tenants requests for support. If you ever have to call to resolve an issue, you usually only get one call to the front desk before they recognize your number and stop picking up. Even when they do pick up, any time you need to speak to a manager/anyone with the authority to resolve your issue, that person always happens to be out of the office (convenient for them since the issues these individuals resolve typically come at a cost to the agency). On one occasion they pulled this routine of ignoring calls and claiming the property manager was out for lunch (at 3pm? Really?) for 3 weeks when my roommate was simply trying to get a refund because we had been double-charged for a $10 electric bill. They gave me the same go-round when I was trying to resolve an issue with the end of my lease. For weeks I called the office to inquire as to whether I would be given a partial refund for my rent payment for the month of November, given that I had committed to vacate by the 20th. All i wanted was to know if I would either receive said refund, or be given until the end of November to vacate. One final note is that, at the start of my tenure with them, they conveniently forgot the addendum on the lease that I sublet, which would state that the lease expires in November, and tried to wrangle my roommate and I into a year long commitment instead of the 3-month commitment we signed up for from the sub-letter. It took an actual visit from the sub-letter with a physical copy of the addendum in hand to overturn this mistake. Horrible, unethical, slimy company that I would advise any and all prospective tenants to avoid at all costs.

owner_response.text: We apologize for the confusion, and we apologize for what may seem as unnecessary delays for completing tasks. Often times it takes a while to verify information such as working with Puget Sound Energy, in which the release of a tenant's account information, despite being the Property Management company for that tenant and property does not guarantee access to billing records, as that is private information. We may get a copy of the bill, but that doesn't give us access to find out whether or not you've made a payment. We did make sure to rectify this, upon receiving all the necessary information. In regards to the change of tenancy and the duplicate leases, we are always willing to send copies of your lease agreements for you to read and review, for clarification of lease end dates. Additionally, you can always come into our office if you need help going over your lease. Again, we are sorry for any confusion and that you felt that your needs were not important to us. Going forward we hope that all your experiences with property management companies exceed your expectations.

google_reviews.author: Ember Hamilton
google_reviews.review: My sister lives at this property and she asked me to write a review about how much she loves it here its always amazing especially when she needs help with anything its fast and reliable Caitlin always helps her and makes her day so much easier whenever there is a problem!!

google_reviews.author: Jon Garner
google_reviews.review: Very pushy people. At first they act friendly but when they think they can get away with taking your rights away as a tenant they will. Clearly a bad decision in going with this company I understand most are like this but the actions they have done I feel they are being hard so they can get a few laughs.  Anyone that is looking for a new spot for their business or home I would recommend going somewhere else.

owner_response.text: Hi Jon, we are sorry that you had a poor experience. We don't see you as an active or previous client in our system. If you could reach out with additional context to your review, we would appreciate the opportunity to correct your concerns.

google_reviews.author: Milan Plachy
google_reviews.review: Would not recommend renting from any of their apartments. Horrible real estate management company, with fees abound, and be careful with any payments you make to them. Any extra service or change of tenancy is a non refundable fee, even if you don't go through with it. Wouldn't let my wife and child live with me, the legality of that is beyond me. Rent is outrageous for what you get, parking spaces in my complex were below the legal size, and just in general rude to their tenants. It's unbelievable they can get away with this, something needs to be done in this country about these landlords/REM companies. Don't go through Landmark if you can avoid it, which I know is hard since only a few companies operate in Bellingham.

owner_response.text: Hi Milan, we appreciate your feedback. If you have any other specific items, you would like to address please feel free to reach out to our Director of Human Resources at Stephanie@visitlandmark.com with your concerns.

google_reviews.author: Francine Lunardi Farias
google_reviews.review: I had a tour today in one property, Victoria was my showing agent and she did great. She is very kind,  and she was always trying to help me and answering all my questions.

google_reviews.author: Lisa Bellevie
google_reviews.review: I was terrified to reach out to Landmark after reading all the reviews but they are one of the biggest Property Management Companies in the area and the market is so crazy right now I couldn't avoid it. I am SO GLAD I called them! They have been ABSOLUTLEY WONDERFUL in every interaction I have had with them so far! Kendra has answered all my questions promptly (and I have had a lot! lol!), she's treated me with respect, been polite and kind during every conversation we have had. Thank you Kendra for helping me find a new place to call home. I will recommend Landmark to anyone I know looking for a place.

owner_response.text: Hi Lisa, Thank you for the 5 star review! We are so happy to hear that Kendra was so accommodating. Kendra is very knowledgeable and has lots of experience which makes her an asset to our team here at Landmark!

google_reviews.author: Jessie Davis
google_reviews.review: Haelley Hogan is very helpful, kind and professional. She listened to me and my concerns and answered all of my questions. I am grateful for her help.

google_reviews.author: Mitchell Walker
google_reviews.review: Landmark is literally the worst real estate place I have ever dealt with. First off their office is so unorganized that if you have any sort of paperwork that the needs to be taken care of it takes them days to process through it all. Secondly, the place that we currently live has needed so many maintenance issues updated on it that were supposed to be completed before we moved into the place. We've had our lease for about 5 months now and they still have yet to complete them all. On top of that there were minor issues that were submitted as maintenance requests, and when confronting them over several weeks later they denied ever receiving any requests. When asks when they would be able to send someone out they said that they had no idea and couldn't even give a time frame. I told them that this was unacceptable and we've been waiting for weeks to have several minor issues resolved (this would take an hour out of any maintenance persons day if even that) they got extremely defensive and then started being the most disrespectful to me for simply asking for a date to schedule a maintenance appointment. As someone who has worked retail for several years and seen a lot of bad customer experiences, this takes the cake as the worst customer experience ever. I will never rent from them again, and I would rate them 0 stars if that were an option.

google_reviews.author: Niko W.
google_reviews.review:
Landmark real estate management Bellingham WA is literally the most unprofessional, rude, and unorganized company I have ever had the displeasure of dealing with.

I made several attempts (emails&phone calls) to contact Landmark regarding to near future rental questions, and no one ever contacted me back, and when I finally reached a rude guy on the phone,
he sounded annoyed and could not wait to hand up on me.

I have decided that a business that treat potential customers in such a way, is not worth my time. And after seeing so much of their Negative reviews, I feel fortunate to pull myself out before it's too late.

google_reviews.author: Carlos Quintero
google_reviews.review: The people Ive encountered so far have been professional and friendly. Im impressed. Theyve made my application process go smoothly and I look forward to being one of their tenants.

google_reviews.author: Aly Horry
google_reviews.review: Living in a rental property managed by Landmark has been a headache for almost 2 years- and we only rented with them for one!! It started when we had to sign a lease 6 months prior to moving in. They hiked the rent up by $100 in between paying the holding fee and signing the lease, they did not take care of the water bill prior to our move-in so we were constantly hours away from having our water shut off, and no one responds to emails/voicemails. Getting repairs done was a nightmare- I had to threaten legal action just to get running water and lights on in the house. We received erroneous bills in the mail which they would say were 'taken care of,' only to receive another bill plus late fee later. They are extremely unscrupulous about returning deposits. Legally they have 14 days to return your deposit so they send a letter stating they are holding your deposit for "estimated" charges. They claim you'll get it back once they receive receipts from their vendors. Good luck! You have to continuously call and email to get any response. I finally consulted a lawyer and I can't wait to be done with them.

google_reviews.author: Deena Resnick
google_reviews.review: CALL BEFORE APPLYING to check availability!!!! They leave taken units up after someone has put a holding fee down and let people apply for them, then send an email saying its unavailable but you can transfer your application to another listing (they will refuse to refund it even if the unit was not available at the time you applied even though they still had it listed). This can be good depending on if there are lots of  listings that appeal to you, however it seems to be a ploy to make people feel invested in Landmark and to then try to force themselves to find a place to apply to with Landmark. I applied to two unrelated units at 6-7pm, and 8:48 am got emails saying that both units had had holding fees placed on them.  I asked to know the exact time for the holding fee because one of the units had been listed for months untouched, so I found the timing a little suspicious that they had been taken overnight just like that. Additionally, they post new units usually when they are closed so you CAN'T call. You have to risk losing the unit by waiting till they open to ask about availability, or risk the wasted fee; they know what you will choose and are literally banking on it. They never got back to me so I can only assume that the listing were taken loooong before I ever applied. They even updated the availability date of on of the units to "Available Now" after they informed me it had been taken. EDIT: Further proof of this suspicion was confirmed when I saw the same taken apartment newly listed on FB marketplace 3 days after a I was informed a holding fee had been placed on it and they had stopped accepting applications on it. (**Enter Landmark's canned response below).

owner_response.text: Hi Deena, thank you for this thorough feedback! I understand your frustration with the process and finding a rental can be difficult as all companies have different policies in place but feel free to call our office anytime with any questions at 360-738-1022. Wish you luck in your future search!

google_reviews.author: jennifer morgan
google_reviews.review:
Vanessa was extremely supportive and patient with me and thoroughly answered all my questions! I am buying a house and needed guidance on how to complete a   lease take (change of tenancy)

I am so grateful for her help today!

google_reviews.review: Angie is helping me look for an apartment and I am happy that she can help me. Thank you so much!

yelp_reviews.author: Jim A.
yelp_reviews.review:
This is not a review from a renter, someone who uses Landmark as a company that finds a place to live for them, I am reviewing them as a property own in Bellingham, using Landmark to take care of my home, and keep it rented. 

I have owned this property since 2005, and have used the people at Landmark, (I say that b/c I think it was like 10 years ago (that's probably not exactly the right date, but it's been a while), they changed the company name to Landmark. 

I have had maybe three agents during this time, and the longest of which, I currently have, Ms. Robbins. I have been thru many things with her, sudden tenant departures (tho those have been rare), working with her on maintenance issues, this is a big one, as Bellingham has no shortage of weather. These things are difficult especially, as I am remote, and have only been to property a handful of times. She does a wonderful job of keeping me in the know, helping me with access to the property, if I have a vendor I want to use, and does yearly inspections for me, if I ask for them. 

I really feel I have a friend, in Bellingham, that cares about my property, and makes the easy calls, and the hard calls to me, so I know where the property stands. 

If I were looking for a property management company in Bellingham, I would start with Landmark. 

Sincerely, 
A. Johnson

yelp_reviews.author: Brandon L.
yelp_reviews.review: Awful company. Try and take all of your security deposit to pay for repairs on there old units that were there previously.

yelp_reviews.author: Matt L.
yelp_reviews.review:
If 0 stars was an option, I would definitely give them a 0. I can't believe this place is still in business after my terrible experience living in Bellingham. I urge you to consider going to another leasing company for your apartment rentals/leasing if you plan on settling in the Bellingham area. I know most Yelp review pages for leasing companies will have negative reviews but I HIGHLY encourage you to read about my experience and consider going to another company when looking for Bellingham apartments/houses.

When I moved into my apartment, I was appalled that they said that they cleaned and fixed the apartment. OK, I'm a pretty clean person but who says the apartment is considered fixed when there are holes punched into the door... Not only did we take photos of this but we reported this immediately to the leasing company and it took them 2-3 months for them to finally fix the doors.  

Now, moving out I'm so appalled at this and to this day I am appalled. Our security deposit was around $800. We made sure the apartment was cleaned spotless, even better than when we moved in. Everything was fixed and tidy with no damages. We got back $24. All I said was "LOL are you serious?" I was so shocked at this. Did they change the carpets? Fix the blinds?  Redid the kitchen with this?!? We called so many times about this and they said they were going to look into this and we finally got an answer saying that there was damage to the apartment case closed. I'm so confused at this and still to this day as we left the apartment in better condition than before. In the end, fighting this for months after we moved out was not worth $300+ of my share of the deposit as we would always get told that a message will be taken and a call will never get returned to us...

I've rented from now 5 places and this is by far the worst company I've ever leased apartments from. Even if you find the perfect apartment complex and it's through them, I want to urge you to find another place to rent from. If you choose to rent from Landmark, you better document everything with your phone (including photos and videos) of when you move in and out and ask for a final ledger upon move out. PLEASE PLEASE find another place. Now I know why the previous tenants left those holes in the apartment (see photos) and I would have probably done it too after all the frustration I faced leasing from Landmark.

yelp_reviews.author: Zoe F.
yelp_reviews.review: I used to rent from landmark a couple of years ago. I ended up having a not so great experience with them initially. Since then, things have changed. The communication with staff was much more friendly and they were very helpful with my request. Great communication and super helpful.

yelp_reviews.author: Dawn V.
yelp_reviews.review:
Landmark appears to be only about the bottom line... more money.
They set up an online app for tenant approval that was a nightmare to use, especially for parents of college students. They had to get rid of that app within one year, but certainly didn't help those of us who were struggling.
The property is rundown. The rules about no smoking and pets are not enforced. There were bug problems that continued for several months. Smoke from neighbors smoking on their porches seeped into the apartment. There was a huge problem with the walkways along the 2nd story entrances. So many soft spots that I was concerned about dropping a foot through the walkway.  
I think of all the time and all the phone calls I have made over the last year for different problems.
Then, in the checkout process, we received approval to check out early. But this was never communicated to the Accounting department. So the Accounting department refused to honor the email approval we received from the property manager. We paid about $500 that they refused to refund.

This company seems very disorganized. And the employees do not seem very happy. Be very cautious if you decide to rent from them.

yelp_reviews.author: Kimberly B.
yelp_reviews.review: I was honestly surprised that I got my deposit back, since I've heard horror stories about property management companies not giving it back, especially in Bellingham. However, regardless of the showing mishaps, i found that it was an overall positive move out experience. I got my deposit on time, I didn't have any trouble after the showing situation. I will be looking to rent from them again. Also, when you go into the office, they're very helpful I found.

yelp_reviews.author: Kat M.
yelp_reviews.review:
Do not be deceived by the seemingly nice properties Landmark owns. I have been a tenant with Landmark for about 7 months now. The entire experience has been nothing short of frustrating and overall exhausting. We will not be renewing our lease here when the lease is up.

I do not know where to even begin with these people. The property manager we deal with is Grace Macdonald. Both room mate and I have not liked this lady from the get go. We moved to Bellingham with the hopes of finding something nicer than our old place and we settled for the place we have now with Landmark. The apartments themselves are decent and fairly new, but the management makes it so that the apartment quality isn't even worthwhile.

Let us start with how unprofessional the landlord is. Every other day or so, we get texts that sound like a third grader wrote them. We have been asked to basically spy on our neighbors and be snitches on each other for Grace. Everything, from literal begging and pleading, to how to park cars etc, is texted about all the time. It seems as though she cannot properly manage her property well at all. Do not think any complaints or maintenance you have will be handled at all.
